employer_or_business_name.description: Employer/Business Name: This field is conditionally mandatory. Either Employer/Business Name or Sponsor Name must be provided

sponsor_name.description: Sponsor Name: This field is conditionally mandatory. Either Employer/Business Name or Sponsor Name must be provided

address.description: This field holds the address and it allows only alphanumeric and space characters

place_of_birth.description: Place Of Birth, this field is mandatory for Pakistani national

error_code.description: Error code identifying the type of error

is_active.description: Indicates if the customer profile is active
